thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text: Rented a 2WD Hyunda SUVi, but got upgraded to a diesel 4WD SUV. In NZ there is a tax for using diesel of around 6 cents per 100 km and the company picked up this cost. The vehicle was new and in excellent condition. Booking through Rentalcars was easy and they were always on hand to answer any questions. The value for my money was amazing and I would definitely use this company again for my next booking.
